title: Here's Why You Must Buy A Porsche 911 Today -- AFTER/DRIVE
description: The air-cooled Porsche 911 has become the poster child of a receding age of cars with driving character. And the prices are reflecting buyers' excitement. Should you get your hands on one now, any way you can, or is there a Porsche 911 bubble waiting to burst? With Zac Moseley and Mike Prichinello from Classic Car Club Manhattan.

asset.title: Here's Why You Must Buy A Porsche 911 Today -- AFTER/DRIVE
